column8: Tell me what I can do.
What might I do for you?
Thank you for thinking of me, lad. Now, I have something for you, too. It's just a trifle, really, though I thought that maybe it could help from time to time.
You honor me. And I shall honor you. Lord Zagreus, O god of blood, I bid that you accept this humble offering on my behalf, and may our friendship endure until the end of time.
Hm. Yes. I was careless.... Though, you must have been quite the respected warrior in your mortal days, Skelly.

I think your father's in no mood for bargaining. Impulsiveness is how Patroclus and myself got in this situation to begin with. So I ask your patience. Thank you for bringing news of him to me. Keep talking to him when you can, will you?
That's good, then. Glad to hear it.
Now that you mention it... I can't.
Let's have a brief word, Prince.
Suggest you hurry in there, lad...
Can't let you in there, lad.
Has to stay shut like that.
Fight like I'd fight out there.
Not here to fight you, lad.
Of course, Mistress. I shall. By your command.
...and then, when that pig-headed braggart ordered me to do it, I swear...
Oh, come on, you can fight better than that.
You are most kind, O Night.
It sounds absurd when you put it quite like that, but yes.
...were it not for you, Pat, I don't even like to think about what I'd have done. The war would have gone differently, then, I suppose.
Hahaha, well... you got me there.
I'll have to take your word for it.
I know the type. Both types.
Maybe both. I've met the sort.
